scripts.test: npm run test:lib:device && npm run test:lib:cache && npm run test:lib:cookie && npm run test:lib:logger && npm run test:lib:spring && npm run test:lib:utils
scripts.test:lib:device: ng test device --watch false --code-coverage && cp coverage/lcov.info coverage/lcov-device.info
scripts.test:lib:cache: ng test cache --watch false --code-coverage && cp coverage/lcov.info coverage/lcov-cache.info
scripts.test:lib:cookie: ng test cookie --watch false --code-coverage && cp coverage/lcov.info coverage/lcov-cookie.info
scripts.test:lib:logger: ng test logger --watch false --code-coverage && cp coverage/lcov.info coverage/lcov-logger.info
scripts.test:lib:spring: ng test spring --watch false --code-coverage && cp coverage/lcov.info coverage/lcov-spring.info
scripts.test:lib:utils: ng test utils --watch false --code-coverage && cp coverage/lcov.info coverage/lcov-utils.info
scripts.build:libs: npm run build:lib:device && npm run build:lib:cache && npm run build:lib:cookie && npm run build:lib:logger && npm run build:lib:spring && npm run build:lib:utils
